categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Rogart Styll was an individual who served in the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Endor. They served as the captain of the Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier Allegiance. Following the sacrifice of the Allegiance for parts, Rogart Styll was given command of the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Edict by Colonel Soran Keize.
Rogart Styll appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
